query: What is the updated guidance on geometric unsharpness (Ug) for radiographic testing in AWS D1.1:2025?
expected_answer: Revised methodology and limitations aligned with ASME Section V Article 2, including new Ug equation
rationale: D1.1:2025 updates geometric unsharpness (Ug) calculations to align with ASME Section V Article 2 for both film and digital radiography. The revised equation and acceptance limits ensure adequate image quality for defect detection while accommodating modern digital detector technology.

citations.excerpt: Geometric unsharpness — Ug = (F × d) / D — maximum limits for film and digital RT
